body.p: Preparing a room as big as 360 or 180 can be daunting, but providing a wide, open space for a meeting, lecture, or event of any kind is essential. The set up of these rooms is not prime for a gathering of people in a circle, so the chairs in the rooms will have to be moved beforehand. This can take upwards of 20 minutes and can take longer depending on how many people are available to help set up. Moving the chairs around presents the meeting place in a better, more prepared light.

In addition to moving the chairs in the AirClassroom, preparing for an event in Shanks includes making sure the Virginia Tech community knows you are hosting an event in the first place. That is, of course, if the event is open to the public. Posting flyers throughout Shanks and in other buildings can also help in spreading the word.
